featured.text: The manager ______ without hesitation after he had been offered a better job in another company.

definition.zh_def: 猶豫，對某事或某行動的猶豫不決或不確定。
definition.en_def: A delay in decision or action due to uncertainty or indecision.
definition.example: Her hesitation to speak up in the meeting made her ideas go unheard.
